Class HypergeometricDistribution

java.lang.Object
HypergeometricDistribution
public class HypergeometricDistribution extends Object
The HypergeometricDistribution class handles the calculation of Hypergeometric distributions and all other statistical values associated with Hypergeometric distributions.
Author:
Rachel Hussmann

  • Method Details

    • hypergeometricDistribution

      public double hypergeometricDistribution(int N, int n, int y, int r)
      The hypergeometricDistribution method calculates the probability of an event occurring when the elements are taken out without replacement.
      Parameters:
      N - The total number of items in the population
      n - The number of successful events in the population
      y - The number of successful events in the sample
      r - The number of items in the sample
      Returns:
      The probability of the event

    • hypergeometricDistribution

      public BigDecimal hypergeometricDistribution(BigInteger N, BigInteger n, BigInteger y, BigInteger r)

      Parameters:
      N - The total number of items in the population
      n - The number of successful events in the population
      y - The number of successful events in the sample
      r - The number of items in the sample
      Returns:
      The probability of the event

    • expectedValue

      public double expectedValue(int n, int r, int N)
      The expectedValue method calculates the expected value (mean) of the hypergeometric distribution.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of successful events in the population
      r - The number of items in the sample
      N - The total number of items in the population
      Returns:
      The expected value of the distribution
